divs: Sighting DetailsAt 2-4-2010, 18:37 (summer time, Brasilia) I saw this "V" shaped object close to the horizon, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. I took a picture of the beautiful sunset from the window of my home office, and minutes later, appeared what a thought to be a smoke and vapor from a plane at high altitude. But the object traveled very fast (angular velocity from my vantage point) and didn't leave anything behind, but moved like a whole thing (different from meteorites I observed on similar conditions years ago. I just had time to take two shots before it disappear behind the mountain. I changed the sensibility of the camera in some seconds between them. It didn't look to me, exactly like a plane, meteorite, cloud, or planet, so I have no explanation.
Summary: Observation of an apparently gaseous v shaped object moving close to the sunset.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Rio de Janeiro
There were no other sightings in Rio de Janeiro on or around February 4th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
